Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates by stating that President Obama was "furious" about being caught on camera holding a pro-Muslim book. There is no evidence or credible news reports to support this claim.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as there is no evidence provided to back up the assertion that President Obama was "furious" about the photo being taken.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that President Obama's anger was specifically related to being caught on camera holding a pro-Muslim book, which is not supported by any evidence.
Exist alternative explanation: An alternative explanation is that President Obama may not have been angry about the photo being taken at all, as there is no evidence to suggest otherwise.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the photographer who took the photo was a known member of the press and was not secretly "in the right place at the right time."
